blocks.headline: Superior Editorial Workflow with TinaCMS.
blocks.text: Effortlessly manage your team's changes and review them through an integrated Git workflow.

blocks.content:
## Optimize Your Editorial Workflow with TinaCMS

TinaCMS supports Editorial workflow through branching, providing a seamless way to review and manage your team's content changes.

items.headline: Integrated Git Workflow
items.text: Enjoy the advantages of a built-in Git workflow for managing and reviewing content changes.

items.headline: Efficient Team Collaboration
items.text: With branch support, easily manage multiple changes from your team simultaneously.

items.headline: Robust Version Control
items.text: Leverage the power of Git's version control to effectively manage and track content revisions.

items.headline: Open Source Frontend
items.text: TinaCMS's frontend codebase is open-source, backed by a vibrant community and regular updates.

items.headline: Quality Assurance
items.text: Review and approve changes before they go live, ensuring quality and accuracy in your content.

items.headline: Streamlined Workflow
items.text: Simplify and optimize your content production process with TinaCMS's efficient editorial workflow.

blocks.headline: Elevate your content production process.
blocks.text: Get started with TinaCMS's superior editorial workflow now.

seo.title: Superior Editorial Workflow with TinaCMS
seo.description: Efficiently manage and review your team's content changes through an integrated Git workflow. Optimize your content production with TinaCMS.
